PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProjectCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common properties for a building project.

PropertyDef.Name: ConstructionMode
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of construction action the project deals with, e.g. new construction, renovation, refurbishment, etc.

PropertyDef.Name: BuildingPermitId
PropertyDef.Definition: The building permit identifier for the written authorization required by building authorities before construction on a specific project can begin.

PropertyDef.Name: GrossAreaPlanned
PropertyDef.Definition: Total planned area for the project. Used for programming the project
